sqlMap.select:
select transaction_cash_in_bank_id as transactionCashInBankId, cash_flow_category_id as cashFlowCategoryId, cash_flow_category_name as cashFlowCategoryName, amount, balance, description, transaction_date as transactionDate, is_debit as isDebit, created_by as createdBy, created_date as createdDate from transaction_cash_in_bank where transaction_date between to_date(#startDate#,'MM/dd/yyyy') and to_date(#endDate#,'MM/dd/yyyy')
cash_flow_category_id = #category#
select balance from transaction_cash_in_bank having max(created_date)
sqlMap.insert: insert into transaction_cash_in_bank (transaction_cash_in_bank_id, cash_flow_category_id, amount, balance, description, transaction_date, is_debit, created_by, created_date) values (#transactionCashInBankId#,#cashFlowCategoryId#, #amount#,#balance#,#description#,to_date(#transactionDate#,'MM/dd/yyyy'), #isDebit#,#createdBy#, sysdate)
